name: viral-ngs-human-depletion
title: viral-ngs-human-depletion
summary: Deplete human reads from an RNA-seq dataset (either paired FASTQ or an unmapped BAM)

inputSpec.name: file
inputSpec.help: Either a FASTQ or unmapped BAM file

inputSpec.name: paired_fastq
inputSpec.help: A FASTQ file containing the mate pairs, if the first file is a FASTQ. Leave empty if the first file is an unmapped BAM.

inputSpec.name: bmtagger_dbs
inputSpec.help: Tarball(s) containing BMTagger databases to deplete (bitmask and srprism outputs)

inputSpec.name: blast_dbs
inputSpec.help: Tarball(s) containing nucleotide BLAST databases to deplete

inputSpec.name: sample_name
inputSpec.help: A sample name, which will be incorporated in the output filenames. By default, derived from the input filename.

inputSpec.name: skip_depletion
inputSpec.help: This flag causes the actual depletion steps to be skipped, instead just generating an unmapped BAM file containing the input reads.
